_sText:
This is a collaboration map.
The authors include:
Me (Spawn, Jail, sections 4 and 6)
Junior (section 2)
Zalos (section 3)
Sangre (section 5)
Apexi (bonus)

This map is based around a health-as-cash system.
You can spend x amount of hp for a certain level
such as; 10 HP for section 2, 20 HP for section 3 so on and so forth.
To return to spawn costs no Health.
You gain 50 hp upon beating a level.
The map is on a 6 minute timer and if you don't beat it within the time given, you are sent to a knife arena.

Enjoy.


Beta Testers:
Intox Server and most of the intox members, thank you <3
A few members from solidsurf <3
And few other people who I cannot remember exactly.
Thank you shini and clutch for hosting the first beta.

If I forgot you, nothing personal, tell me and I will add you!
